statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode, language, font_size FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, language FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE font_size > 12;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY dark_mode DESC, font_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = TRUE ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, language FROM user_preferences WHERE font_size > 16 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode, font_size FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY dark_mode DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = FALSE AND font_size BETWEEN 12 AND 18 ORDER BY user_id ASC, font_size DESC;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode, language, font_size FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = TRUE OR language = 'Spanish' ORDER BY language ASC, font_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT user_id, theme, font_size FROM user_preferences WHERE font_size > 12;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM app_settings WHERE setting_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM app_settings WHERE setting_value LIKE '%dark%';
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, language, font_size FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'english' AND font_size > 12 ORDER BY font_size ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT MAX(font_size) AS max_font_size, MIN(font_size) AS min_font_size FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM app_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%color%' ORDER BY setting_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = TRUE;
SELECT language, font_size FROM user_preferences WHERE font_size > 12;
SELECT * FROM app_settings ORDER BY theme ASC;
SELECT primary_color, notifications FROM app_settings WHERE notifications = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, language FROM user_preferences WHERE font_size > 14;
SELECT user_id, theme, notifications FROM app_settings WHERE primary_color = 'blue';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English' OR language = 'Spanish';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM app_settings
SELECT display_name, email_address FROM user_profiles
SELECT user_id, theme_color, font_size FROM user_preferences
SELECT user_id, action_timestamp, action_description FROM user_history ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM app_settings WHERE setting_name='timezone'
SELECT user_id, display_name, email_address FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 'f1fdba61-87e1-4c95-9812-8e8ec1127b6c';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE dark_mode = true AND notifications_enabled = false;
SELECT user_id, action_timestamp, action_description FROM user_history ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM app_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE 'theme_%';
SELECT user_id, display_name, language_code FROM user_profiles WHERE timezone = 'GMT' ORDER BY display_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users_preferences;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, font_size FROM users_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, enable_push_notifications FROM user_notifications WHERE enable_push_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, preferred_language FROM user_languages WHERE preferred_language = 'English';
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_enabled, show_recent_activity FROM user_settings WHERE dark_mode_enabled = TRUE OR show_recent_activity = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC, theme_color ASC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_language FROM user_languages WHERE preferred_language = 'English';
SELECT user_id, enable_email_notifications FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, show_recent_activity, enable_auto_play FROM user_settings WHERE dark_mode_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences_history WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY updated_timestamp DESC;
